title: Food: A Love Story - Jim Gaffigan

Bacon. McDonalds. Cinnabon. Hot Pockets. Kale. Stand-up comedian and author Jim Gaffigan has made his career rhapsodizing over the most treasured dishes of the American diet (Ã¢â‚¬Å“choking on bacon is like getting murdered by your loverÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½) and decrying the worst offenders (Ã¢â‚¬Å“kale is the early morning of foodsÃ¢â‚¬ï¿½). Fans flocked to his New York Times bestselling book Dad is Fat to hear him riff on fatherhood but now, in his second book, he will give them what they really craveÃ¢â‚¬â€hundreds of pages of his thoughts on all things culinary(ish). Insights such as: why he believes coconut water was invented to get people to stop drinking coconut water, why pretzel bread is #3 on his most important inventions of humankind (behind the wheel and the computer), and the answer to the age-old question Ã¢â‚¬Å“which animal is more delicious: the pig, the cow, or the bacon cheeseburger?Ã¢â‚¬ï¿½
